website_summaries.verdict: A unique car stereo and fully-equipped infotainment system for older cars with a single din space for traditional factory sound systems.
pros: Comes with a complete 7-inch touchscreen display in a small package
The screen is quick and responsive to the touch
Accepts DVDs and USB sticks for music and video playback for passengers in the vehicle
cons: Front panel screen is slow to fully expand and retract

website_summaries.verdict: Provides basic DVD and CD playback without the advanced, expensive features of other models.
pros: Uses a fully motorized LCD screen for compact use
Compatible with most single stereo or single-DIN vehicles
Provides different media connections such as USB and auxiliary inputs
cons: Radio can cut in and out regardless of the actual signal reception

customer_reviews.title: Withstands Jeep life
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my single din Jeep wrangler LJ and have been impressed. Because it was not expensive, I originally thought it was going to be ok for a year, but have been very surprised and happy 3 years later. The screen still operates flawlessly, the sound quality is good. It has taken the rough ride of my jeep both on and off roading. Only issue is the volume from bluetooth pairing with phone could be higher max (it is a Jeep after all).
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Well I brought my dream project car and needed a radio. Wanted another boss 10.1 inch screen but they out of stock. Brought this one the remote works good, and screen is good. I just got some subs hate it doesn't have true bass or sub control but I installed a bass knob. Doesn't have much power. If u not really trying to be booming this a nice radio.
customer_reviews.author: MRFAMU03

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this radio for my Toyota Tacoma 2008. It's good quality but there are a few things that could be fixed. the response time could be a bit better, but that may just be me being used to using my phone. I wish there could be more customization options throughout the system and easier eq editing settings. Bluetooth is ok, but it does just cut out every once and a while, but that may just be my phone. It was easy to crimp the wires together with how they were labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Parrish Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support all it says!
customer_reviews.text: Can barely use the screen. Cant watch dvds cant connect and stream movies or music from my phone unless it's just sound. But any bluetooth stereo can do that! I bought this particular item to be able to stream movies from my phone onto the screen so that the kids can watch movies in the back on long rides. Not only does it not do that but if u put a DVD in. It says cannot watch unless ebrake is engaged and even after engaging the ebrake multiple times it still wouldn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I like it !
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I don't see why people hate on the radio. Screen is a bit slightly unresponsive but nothing greatly noticable. The eq was able to be messed with and sounds great. Made the speakers sound better also. Great value for the money especially when single din is the best easier option.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Touchless Screen
customer_reviews.text: the touch screen is hard to use. And when the phone rings it flips the screen up.. I have been unable to find the setting to keep this from happening. And now that thr touch screen isn't working properly I gave up.. Purchased 12/2019; installed 1/2021
customer_reviews.author: Cw

customer_reviews.title: CABLE HELP
customer_reviews.text: I soldered all of the wires correctly and once I used it. The screen was telling me I had to check the cable connection. I connected the cables the system came with and it didn’t change anything and I can’t use the radio. I don’t want to connect a camera
customer_reviews.author: eric garcia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product them I have to pay for return..don't seem right
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I really like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I really hope this radio last as long as I have this truck cause I really like it. It has a lot more features than the power acoustic I previously had. Not sure of the longevity of this radio but so far I really like it and I would recommend it for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like 4k audio
customer_reviews.text: My music is very crisp and clean since installing this new head unit. My sub responds very well with clean bass and the radio stations even sound better.
customer_reviews.author: Charleston Selman

customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product for price point, That’s as simple of description as I can get. I knew it would be good, just not “amazing” I don’t mind it, works for my simple needs and still looks cool
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel

customer_reviews.title: Don't like cold weather?
customer_reviews.text: Installed it worked great, next morning woke up it turned on when I went to turn the key to on position but as soon as I went to start it lost power.. I ripped the dash apart and toyed with it for 20 mins and finally got the power back! Throught the day no issues, but came the next morning and exact same thing happend... Maybe not made for Nebraska weather but should have disclaimer at that point, oh yeah I only owned it for two days so brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out of the box. It has more power than factory, so plan to do a speaker upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: James Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: The CD/DVD reader slips on mild bumps but everything else functions great
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It took me 6 weeks before I had time to install it. After 2 weeks, i jumped in my truck to go to work and one side was sticking out. When I checked to see what happened, the clips on the side had broke off. Do not purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: K. McClain

customer_reviews.title: Bad internal Microphone
customer_reviews.text: microphone on head unit does not work well, weak and distorted. Had to return and get unit with external mic. Everything else worked great.

customer_reviews.title: Package was not wrapped just in the original box
customer_reviews.text: The radio itself it's about the packaging it came in it was in the original box exposing that it was a radio and could have easily been stolen if no one was home because you can see what the item was. I must add that the radio itself is fine and more than what I thought it would be. Nice

customer_reviews.title: it gets the job done well.. kinda.
customer_reviews.text: it does not automatically switch to camera when backing up, and it does not play music when the camera is selected.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's Remorse
customer_reviews.text: I know this item looks really cool, but think twice before you buy it. I've had mine for about 6 months, and now the pop-up screen no longer pops-up...it's a huge inconvenience because I used the screen to control my music stuff. Now I have to use the dial nob, which is fine but street roads can be bumpy, and it can sometimes cause you to turn up/turn down something on accident (equalizer wise) and that can get kind of annoying.

customer_reviews.title: Bad

Wish there was an option to just keep the screen up at all times. Other than that its a great set up if you do not have anything to interupt the screen coming in and out.

I bought blank DVD's of 4.7 GB to put my movies on it still won't read them! Somebody help me with this please! Right now i'm hhighly frustrated!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good sound excellent features easy to install

customer_reviews.title: Ok, for the price. Mic doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: The radio is great for the price. Streaming audio is good quality. Touch screen works great along with most functions. The only problem I have is the microphone doesn't work well. I wanted this for hands free driving and it hasn't meet my needs.

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money.
customer_reviews.text: This pop out head unit is great for its price. Had it for a few months now, worth every penny. Visibility only limited in small time frames when sunrise or sunset will understandably affect it. Improved sound quality over factory unit.

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Love it!

I love knowing that if someone breaks into my vehicle, they will not be able to steal the radio. My truck has 3 tv screens so I needed a dvd player. The video quality is awesome (hard too see in the video I'm posting). Sound quality is great, and the customizable colors are cool!

customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband n he loved it so much, it plays well n sounds great n great features.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Honda Element EX car.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to install it on Honda Element but didn't work for the EX model. The LX model would have work well. The EX model have the anti-theft, automatic lock door that is associated with the OEM radio. It's a bum now that it won't work on my car. I had hard time installing it. I have to get an antenna for the car and didn't work at all. The BOSS technical help is non existence at all. The bluetooth works great.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.text: DVD picture looks amazing, sound quality is good, style is nice, BUT, the volume knob broke off and I contacted boss and they said the part is $48, and I can't figure out how to get the warranty, so I doubt they would cover it. When it's super cold you can hear the fan rubbing a little, but that's barely a problem, I just wish there was a way to connect Google maps to it from my phone. 2 stars because of the volume knob situation.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good for a few weeks then after that something coming out ( SOUND ) every time you turn in on and the fan for this is so loud every time the item is on.

customer_reviews.title: Like the rear camera only works by pressing aux then ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little trial and error to learn features. Like the rear camera only works by pressing aux then play. It does not work automatically when truck put in reverse.

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the box. I have quite a bit of experience wiring electronics in vehicles and was unable to get the unit to power up with numerous different wiring harnesses, from the one provided by BOSS to the one recommended by the vehicle manufacturer. Finally took it to a professional installation location who hooked it in to a diagnostic computer and confirmed that it was DOA.
customer_reviews.author: Evil B

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy the screen and blue tooth will stop working and even if under warranty for defect you can not get a hold of them.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 6 months and the screen and Bluetooth stopped working. So I tried to contact the seller since it is still under warranty and it seems to be a defect and they will drop your call after 20 minutes on hold and I tried to call over and over again and they will not pick up and they just put me on hold and drop my call after a while. I am very disappointed and wish I could give it zero stars but I have to give it one. So I will go for another brand like dual or Pyle .
customer_reviews.author: dimetry

customer_reviews.title: The tuner is terrible compared to the factory radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit over a year ago and finally got around to having it installed by a professional. The tuner is terrible compared to the factory radio. Every station but one local channel has a lot of static. It even looses signal enough to start a random search. The main reason I bought this unit was for bluetooth connectivity and spotify streaming. Connecting my phone was a breeze but once the music starts there is a very loud humming sound. It is loud enough to make streaming unbearable. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Lookabill

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems BV9979B Car DVD Player - Single Din, Bluetooth Audio & Hands-Free Calling, Multi-color Illumination, DVD, CD, MP3, USB, SD Aux-in, AM/FM Radio Receiver, 7 Inch LCD Touchscreen, Black
product_meta.description: Burn up the miles while listening to hot tunes with the BOSS Audio BV9979B entertainment system. Pop in a DVD/CD, turn on the radio, hook up your smartphone to the Auxiliary input or blast out music from the USB and SD ports. Bluetooth technology allows you to stream music apps like Pandora and Spotify and stay connected with hands-free calling. Change up the look with Multi-Color Illumination options. Keep it all under control from the existing steering wheel controls (interface required, not included), touchscreen and wireless remote. The detachable front panel can be quickly removed and stored for your peace of mind. Get the power and versatility that the BOSS Audio BV9979B offers to rock your ride. For further product details, please scroll down.
feature_bullets: BLUETOOTH: Answer / make calls and be hands-free with no distractions. The built-in microphone picks up your voice and your car speakers let you hear the person on the other side. Play and control your music and apps like Spotify / Pandora wirelessly

MEDIA PLAYBACK: Play music through your Bluetooth device, pop in a CD/DVD or use the USB/SD ports. Digital media support include MP3 and WMA file formats. Tune into the AM/FM radio stations for up to date music/news/sports and more
MULTI COLOR ILLUMINATION: Set the mood and make your car into your very own sanctuary. With over 16 Million color combinations, you can set a different tone every day of the week

INPUTS: USB/SD, rearview camera (sold separately). The steering wheel interface allows you to use the existing functions on your steering wheel (interface module sold separately. We recommend the Metra ASWC-1)
AUXILIARY INPUT: Compatible with the audio output from smartphones as well as MP3 players. Just plug in and start playing

OUTPUTS: Use the video, front, rear & subwoofer pre-amp outputs to hook up your speakers (front left / front right and rear left / rear right) and subwoofer. The video output allows you to connect an extra screen for more viewing capability
EQUALIZER: Customize how you want to hear your music with the balance / fader / bass and treble and control it all with the wireless remote control from either inside or outside of your vehicle
SPECIFICATIONS: Dimensions – 7.38” x 7” x 2”, Weight – 5.66 Lbs, 85 watts x 4 Max power

WARRANTY: BOSS Audio Systems provides a powerful 3-year platinum online dealer warranty so long as the purchase is made through Amazon.com. We strongly encourage professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality
Memory slots available: SD Memory Card
